CVXPY
Minimize
  0.0
Subject To
 24: x == 1.0
Bounds
 x free
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
 Obj: 0 x_0
Subject to
 c1: +1 x_0 = +1
Bounds
 x_0 free
End
----------------------------------------
SCIP
Minimize
 Obj: 0 x
Subject to
 24: +1 x = +1
Bounds
 x free
End
